taskbody.context: To change attributes of a table, take the following steps:

step.cmd: Place the cursor in a table whose attributes you want to change.

choices.choice: To remove/return all column separators, uncheck/check the Table Column Separator menu item.
To remove/return all row separators, uncheck/check the Table Row Separator menu item.
To remove/return the separator of the current row, uncheck/check the Current Row Separator menu item.
To remove/return the row separator of the current cell, uncheck/check the Current Cell Row Separator menu item.

To change the frame settings, choose Table Frame and one of the following:
For a border on all sides, choose All.
For a bottom border only, choose Bottom.
For left and right borders only, choose Sides.
For no border, choose None.
For a top border only, choose Top.
For top and bottom borders only, choose Top and Bottom.

To change column attributes, choose Column Attributes and specify individual attributes for each column in the Column Attributes Dialog:
Specify the Name, Width and Align values as needed.
Check/uncheck the Column Separator and Row Separator checkboxes as needed.
Click OK.
To align the content in all the cells, choose Align in Table Center/Char/Justify/Left/Right .
To align the content in the current cell, choose Cell Align Center/Char/Justify/Left/Right .
